thoughts.text: I think it would be useful to read a file.
thoughts.reasoning: Reading a file can help me access information stored in a file and use it in my program.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'read_file' command to read the specified file and store the contents in a variable.
thoughts.criticism: I should make sure to specify the correct file name and location to avoid reading the wrong file.
thoughts.speak: I would like to read a file. I will use the 'read_file' command to help me with this task.
